title: What worked, what didn’t? Coaches of Pogačar, Vingegaard lift the lid on Tour de France training
content:
Jumbo-Visma and UAE Emirates trainers reveal how the most fundamental principles still rule in the biggest bike race in the world.

Read the full article at What worked, what didn’t? Coaches of Pogačar, Vingegaard lift the lid on Tour de France training on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
